title.rendered: What To Know Before Installing A Tinted Windshield

content.rendered:
There are many reasons why people enjoy having tinted windows for their cars. Some like to accentuate their exterior window appearance while others may have tinted windows for health reasons. As professionals in auto glass in Chicago, we want to make sure you know some facts before you decide to get your windshields tinted.

Different Tint Types

There are different types of tints to cheese from so make sure you do your research before you decide to change the look of your vehicle. For example, metallic tins help reflect harmful UV rays off your windshield while traditional, non-metallic tints help protect high-tech navigational systems and electronic amenities.

Tint Warranty Coverage

Many of the top-notch tints come with a limited lifetime warranty, but make sure you confirm the time-period of that warranty—including fine-line print—before you decide to buy the product. In addition, invest in the manufacturer’s warranty, filled out by the installer.

Laws For Tinting

There are tint laws in specific areas, so you need to adhere to all traffic rules and regulations. Depending on the state you live in, your tint laws may vary. Between the state and the make and model of your vehicle, make sure you’re sticking to all the rules and laws before you invest in this new addition to your car.
As auto glass professionals in Chicago, we want to make sure you stay safe while on the road. If you need auto glass repairs, contact Aero Auto parts today.
